mapper.select:
select id, sql_sql, echar_type, x, y, is_dz, title, sub_title, call_back_class, call_back_js, DEL_FLAG, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, CREATE_USER_NAME, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_USER_NAME, bak1, bak2, bak3, bak4, bak5, bak6 from zjk_pic where 1=1
and id like '%${id}%'
and sql_sql like '%${sqlSql}%'
and echar_type like '%${echarType}%'
and x like '%${x}%'
and y like '%${y}%'
and is_dz like '%${isDz}%'
and title like '%${title}%'
and sub_title like '%${subTitle}%'
and call_back_class like '%${callBackClass}%'
and call_back_js like '%${callBackJs}%'
and DEL_FLAG like '%${delFlag}%'
and CREATE_DATE like '%${createDate}%'
and CREATE_USER like '%${createUser}%'
and CREATE_USER_NAME like '%${createUserName}%'
and UPDATE_DATE like '%${updateDate}%'
and UPDATE_USER like '%${updateUser}%'
and UPDATE_USER_NAME like '%${updateUserName}%'
and bak1 like '%${bak1}%'
and bak2 like '%${bak2}%'
and bak3 like '%${bak3}%'
and bak4 like '%${bak4}%'
and bak5 like '%${bak5}%'
and bak6 like '%${bak6}%'
order by ${iSortCol} ${sSortDir_0}
